name: Lifecycle State Change
description: Sent to selected users when an identity's lifecycle state changes.
subject: Lifecycle state change for ${identityName}
body:
#if ($newState == "Pending Worker Expired")

Since the Pending Worker ${identityName} has exceeded the 30-day projected start date, the associated Active Directory account has been deleted.

#else

The user ${identityName}'s status has changed to ${newState}.

#end

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
